responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "D307B005497D12E1026D3BBBD22D5620", "In light of recent developments in Halcyon, there\'s reason to believe that there\'s something more sinister brewing at the Citadel. There have been reports of our cultist neighbors boldly wandering through their ranks. It\'s highly suspicious, not to mention treacherous. Some have set up their strange instruments nearby. Since you have been successful so far, this covert mission may be suited for your talents.")
name: CSQ_RVR_0081_FB_NordenResnik_DLG_89_Response
